TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DebugEngineCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

summary.span: 參考由工作流程運算式評估元件叫用的回呼方法。

span.span: References a callback method that is invoked by the workflow expression evaluation component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 預設回呼是由物件在工作流程執行階段引擎內部實作，該物件在獨立執行緒上執行並提供工作流程運算式評估的內容。The default callback is implemented internally in the workflow runtime engine by an object that runs on an independent thread and provides context for workflow expression evaluation.
